special_text:
When Seth enters, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, you may activate loyalty abilities of Seth twice this turn rather than only once.
[+1]: Switch up to one target creature's power and toughness until your next turn.
[-3]: Seth deals 2 damage to any target.
[-7]: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand. Put the rest in your graveyard.
